snippet: Qatar announced Wednesday that it would buy billions of dollars of Egyptian government bonds, giving critical support to President Mohamed Morsi to mend the  ailing economy.
abstract: Qatar's government says it will buy billions of dollars of Egyptian government bonds, giving critical support to Pres Mohamed Morsi to mend Egypt's ailing economy.
lead_paragraph: Qatar announced Wednesday that it would buy billions of dollars of Egyptian government bonds, giving critical support to President Mohamed Morsi to mend the  ailing economy.

headline.seo: Egypt: Qatar Offers Support With Bond Purchase
headline.main: Egypt: Qatar Offers Support With Bond Purchase
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Qatar Offers Support With Bond Purchase
